short_description: fastpath function to compute metrics for the purpose of evaluation of regression models and cross-model comparison. Supports 14 metrics {MAE,MSE,MSLE,MAPE,MPE,RMSE,RMSLE,ME,R2,EV,AR2,MPD,MGD,FSTAT}.
long_description: fastpath function to compute metrics for the purpose of evaluation of regression models and cross-model comparison. Supports 14 metrics {MAE,MSE,MSLE,MAPE,MPE,RMSE,RMSLE,ME,R2,EV,AR2,MPD,MGD,FSTAT}.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: ObservationColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column which contains actual value of the response variable.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column which contains actual value of the response variable.

argument_clauses.name: PredictionColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column which contains predicted value of the response variable.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column which contains predicted value of the response variable.

argument_clauses.name: Metrics
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the Metrics names which will be computed for the purpose of evaluation of regression models and cross-model comparison.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the Metrics names which will be computed for the purpose of evaluation of regression models and cross-model comparison.

argument_clauses.name: NumOfIndependentVariables
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the number of independent variables which were used during modelling.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the number of independent variables which were used during modelling.

argument_clauses.name: DegreesOfFreedom
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the numerator degree of freedom and denominator degree of freedom.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the numerator degree of freedom and denominator degree of freedom.
